Search disables tools: The current model does not support tool calls when web search is enabled, which may affect task results
Web search not supported: The current model does not support calling the web search tool
About me placeholder: Define the AI employee’s role, guide its work, and instruct it complete user-assigned tasks. This will be part of the prompt of this AI employee.
Reset successfully: Reset successfully, please submit to save
Shared by all AI employees. Read-only.
Only available to this AI employee. Read: Only available to this AI employee. Read-only.
Created via workflow. You can add/remove: Created by workflow. You can add/remove and set default permissions.
Provide a list of suggested prompts for: Provide a list of suggested prompts for the user to choose from.
Search docs tool description: Search docs by module identifiers (for example, runjs) and English keywords, and return the available document paths.
Read docs tool description: Read files or list directories inside storage/ai/docs using canonical module-based paths.
Additional system prompt appended to the: Additional system prompt appended to the AI employee’s definition, used to refine instructions
Base URL is optional, leave blank to use: Base URL is optional, leave blank to use default (recommended)
Are you sure delete this datasource?: Are you sure delete this datasource?
Auto skill description: When auto skill usage is enabled, the AI employee will invoke tools automatically when needed. Otherwise, the tool call parameters will be returned in the conversation for the user to review and trigger manually.
Bio placeholder: The introduction to the AI employee will inform human colleagues about its skills and how to use it. This information will be displayed on the employee’s profile. This will not be part of the prompt of this AI employee.
Chat error warning: Failed to send message. Please contact the administrator or try again later.
Cite {{count}} pieces of information as: Cite {{count}} pieces of information as references
Data source settings description: The selected collections will be included in the AI employee’s system definition. Metadata such as collection names and field details will be provided to the LLM at the start of each conversation, helping the AI understand and respond to natural language queries for data access or retrieval.
Displays the AI employee’s assigned task: Displays the AI employee’s assigned tasks on the profile when hovering over the button.
Fill the form with the given content: Fill the form with the given content
Frequency penalty description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.
Generates ECharts options (JSON) based o: Generates ECharts options (JSON) based on user input or data context.
Get models list failed, you can enter a: Get models list failed, you can enter a model name manually.
Greeting message placeholder: Opening message sent to the user when starting a new conversation.
Label for task selection buttons when mu: Label for task selection buttons when multiple tasks exist
Max completion tokens description: An upper bound for the number of tokens that can be generated for a completion, including visible output tokens and reasoning tokens.
Oops! Something went wrong. Let me diagn: Oops! Something went wrong. Let me diagnose and fix it.
Role setting description: The system prompt for the AI model, defines who "I" am, as well as the rules and requirements I follow to perform tasks.
Role setting placeholder: The system prompt for the AI model, defines who "I" am, as well as the rules and requirements I follow to perform tasks.
Personalized prompt description: You can set personalized prompt for the current AI employee which will be sent to the LLM at the start of each new conversation.
Position description: A short label indicating the AI employee’s responsibility.
Presence penalty description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics.
Response format description: Important: when using JSON mode, you must also instruct the model to produce JSON yourself via a system or user message.
Retrieve metadata for specified collecti: Retrieve metadata for specified collections and their fields
Retrieve names and titles map of all col: Retrieve names and titles map of all collections
Temperature description: What sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.
Title: Title
Tools available for LLM function calling: Tools available for LLM function calling
Top P description: An alternative to sampling with temperature, called nucleus sampling, where the model considers the results of the tokens with top_p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens comprising the top 10% probability mass are considered.
Triggered by AI employees through tool c: Triggered by AI employees through tool calling.
You are currently using the Gemini LLM s: You are currently using the Gemini LLM service. When Web Search is enabled, AI employees will temporarily be unable to use skills
Please complete role setting before subm: Please complete role setting before submitting
Please complete model setting before sub: Please complete model setting before submitting
Select allowed models (leave empty for a: Select allowed models (leave empty for all)
If no models are selected, all enabled m: If no models are selected, all enabled models will be available for this AI employee.
Restrict which models this AI employee c: Restrict which models this AI employee can use. Leave empty to allow all enabled models.
You have not configured any LLM service: You have not configured any LLM service yet. Please configure one to start using AI employees.
LLM services are required for AI employe: LLM services are required for AI employees to function. You can configure providers like OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini, and more.
Automatically use the best models select: Automatically use the best models selected by the system
Select models manually from the list: Select models manually from the list
Select the models allowed to use: Select the models allowed to use
Please fill in the API Key first: Please fill in the API Key first
Test connection with the configured API: Test connection with the configured API Key
AI disclaimer: AI can make mistakes, please check important info.
ai.tools.getContextApis.title: Get context APIs
ai.tools.getContextApis.about: Get available API methods from context
ai.tools.getContextEnvs.title: Get context environment
ai.tools.getContextEnvs.about: Get current page/block/flow model metadata from context
ai.tools.getContextVars.title: Get context variables
ai.tools.getContextVars.about: Available variables from context. Get values via `await ctx.getVar()`, e.g. `await ctx.getVar('ctx.popup.record')`.
ai.tools.lintAndTestJS.title: Lint and test JavaScript code
ai.tools.lintAndTestJS.about: Lint, sandbox-check, and trial-run a JavaScript snippet. Returns diagnostics. Call before outputting final code.
Please contact the administrator to conf: Please contact the administrator to configure models
